item.description:
Starting JUNE 12th, MEETUPS TO BE HELD AT BOSTON COMMON @11am and DOGGIE DAY @ 1PM. 

 Hi all, It's been a long time since we have been able to meetup at the park as well. In years past, the large green near the Boylston T stop on the Common seem to be a good location for folks to find each other, bring a picnic blanket and water for the pups. Let's try again to meet there beginning with out June 12th Meetup. Therefore, there will be TWO meetups on the same day. One at the park @11am and the other as always at Doggie Day @1pm. Feel free to attend both or your preference of AC versus sunshine. All I ask is that members please RSVP which location(s) you plan going to. Also, please remember the Boston Common does require all pets to be on a leash. I will also be positing a poll on the message board to see if there is any interest in other locations. So please take a moment to give me your feedback. 

Thanks,

 Susana 

 

 

 Please note our next SUNDAY meetup will be held at both The Boston Common @ 11:am and Doggie Day @ 1PM[/color] . Doggie Day PLaycenter 400 Tremont Street Boston, MA 02116 (877) 738-7738
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua Meetup
